Do you hate headphone wires as much as I do? Do they ever get in your way or
tangle when you’re exercising?

Would you like to shed wires completely?

Then you need wireless Bluetooth earbuds.

**What are “True Wireless” Bluetooth Earbuds?**

![Nike PowerBeats 3 Wireless
Headphones](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20608%20400'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Nike
PowerBeats 3 Wireless
Headphones](https://d3f8t323tq9ys5.cloudfront.net/uploads/2017/01/Nike-
powerbeats3-wireless-earphones.jpg)

**Not all Bluetooth headphones are created equal. Some still have wires, so
they’re not truly “wireless” as advertised.**

[Bluetooth headphones are great](https://www.soundguys.com/5-reasons-to-buy-
bluetooth-headphones-12362/). Bluetooth earbuds are much better.

Why? Because they’re incredibly small; often no bigger than a hearing aid. You
can place them inside your ears and forget about them. And because they’re so
tiny, they’re easier to conceal. While we don’t recommend listening to music
or a podcast during your morning conference, you could probably do it and get
away with it.

However, you might want to [pick one that protects your
hearing](https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/health-science/how-to-pick-
the-best-headphones-and-protect-your-
hearing/2018/09/28/af1cd620-b502-11e8-a7b5-adaaa5b2a57f_story.html?noredirect=on&utm_term=.b708f2a1cc64),
especially if you’re wearing them for hours!

**Why You Need True Wireless Earbuds**

They allow you to shed the wires that can bog you down and get in the way. If
you’re doing a physical activity like running or even mowing the lawn, wires
get real annoying, real fast.

I can’t remember how many times I’ve bent down only to have the headphone plug
yank out of the port with conventional headphones. Wires suck!

The real benefit, however, is that you can leave your phone in your pocket, or
stream directly from a smartwatch on your wrist via a Bluetooth connection.
Actually, you can often connect them to other types of media players too –
like an MP3 player or iPod.

## **The Best True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds – 2019**

Based on our research and reviews, here are the best true wireless Bluetooth
earbuds in the market today.

## **1.[Apple Airpods Pro (3rd Gen): Best of the Best True Wireless
Earbuds](https://ideaing.com/open/6516/product)**

[![New Apple AirPods Pro \(3rd
Gen\)](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20400%20436'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![New
Apple AirPods Pro \(3rd Gen\)](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/71bhWgQK-
cL._AC_SL1500_.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/6516/product)

 **The new Airpods Pro offers immersive sound, connecting you with the world
around you**

People always have mixed emotions when the new Airpods came out. Apple is just
fancy now sans innovation, they would say. But the [Apple Airpods
Pro](https://ideaing.com/product/apple-airpods-pro-3rd-gen) just win back
Apple’s game. Unlike the original Airpods which always fell off, these babies
have the perfect fit, clinging comfortably on your ears. The secret’s on the
internally tapered tips that conform to your ear shape while equalizing the
pressure for maximum comfort. You can wear it all day.

It has active noise cancellation for an immersive sound, but at the same time,
it makes you aware of your surroundings. One user claims that this earphone
saved his life–thanks to its transparency mode which lets you listen to music
knowing that you can will not ran over by a car on the street because you’ll
hear it coming.

**Why You Should Get It**

Audio nerds love it so will you. They’re not bulky, sleek, and they feel a lot
snugger. Users say it’s 100% worth it.

**Pros**

  * Active noise cancellation
  * Transparency mode so you connect with your environment
  * Comes with 3 sizes of tapered silicon tips
  * Water and sweat-resistant
  * Quick access to Siri
  * Over 24 hours of battery life

 **Cons**

  * Expensive price (as usual)

## **2.[Echo Buds: Best True Wireless with
Alexa](https://ideaing.com/open/6562/product)**

[![Echo Buds Wireless
Earbuds](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20465%20303'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Echo
Buds Wireless Earbuds](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/515TyGkOTBL._AC_SL1000_.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/6562/product)

**Stream music, play audiobooks and make calls with Alexa.**

Fit. Comfort. And Mic sensitivity. These are usually the top qualities that
people are looking for when buying wireless earphones. Well, these **[Echo
Buds](https://ideaing.com/product/amazon-wireless-echo-buds)** deliver. And
offer more!

First, the noise cancellation is superb. It’s from Bose after all. Sound
quality? Super check. The lows are lows and the highs are highs. You can fear
the depth of each sound. And if you’re relying on Alexa to help, Echo Buds
will complement your lifestyle. Make calls without taking your phone out of
your pockets or your bag. Tell Alexa to play music for you. Alexa can even
help you make notes.

As one user puts it, Echo Buds is like a glass of fine wine or scotch. As time
unfolds and you get to discover the features, you’ll love it even more.

**Why You Should Get It**

If you’re looking for a cheaper alternative for wireless earphones with active
noise reduction and transparency mode, the Echo buds are perfect. Bonus if
you’re always asking Alexa to do stuff for you too!

**Pros**

  * Immersive sound, crisp audio
  * Hands-free with Alexa (or Siri or Google Assistant)
  * Up to 5 hours of music play
  * Customizable fit
  * Sweat-resistant
  * Built with privacy in mind

 **Cons**

  * Tips don’t fit comfortably

## **3.[Apple Airpods 2.0 with Wireless Charging Case: Best with
iPhone](https://ideaing.com/open/5534/product)**

[![Apple AirPods with Wireless Charging Case \(Latest
Model\)](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20401%20330'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Apple
AirPods with Wireless Charging Case \(Latest Model\)](https://images-na.ssl-
images-
amazon.com/images/I/41qIPi7taiL._SL1024_.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/5534/product)

**The new Apple Airpods have quick access to Siri and a new Apple H1 chip for
faster wireless conneciton.**

We can’t really talk about Bluetooth earbuds without mentioning Apple’s new
duds. If you use them in combination with your iPhone there are some really
cool features. For example, as soon as you place them in your ears they are
automatically turned on and synced up with the phone. This makes connecting to
your phone, which can be a hassle with other headsets, incredibly simple.

The latest model is simply cool too. It now comes with a wireless charging
case and charges via a charging mat or a lighting connector.

Also you can use them to listen to music, but you can also use them to
communicate with Siri and contacts – they double as a Bluetooth phone headset.

They get up to 5 hours of use on a single charge, which can be boosted up to
24 hours if you use the included charging case. What more could you ask for?

**Why You Should Get It**

If you’re an Apple fan, you’ll love these. Anyone that owns and uses Apple’s
Airpods seems to seem to love them, rating them highly.

**Pros**

  * Up to 24 hours of battery life with the charging case
  * Always connected and smart
  * Quick access to Siri or to your friend on the other line; double tap to activate
  * Touch-based volume controls

 **Cons**

  * Expensive price (of course)

## **4.[Samsung Galaxy Buds: Best with Galaxy
Phones](https://ideaing.com/open/5537/product)**

[![Samsung Galaxy Buds True Wireless
Earbuds](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20464%20309'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Samsung
Galaxy Buds True Wireless Earbuds](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/71H4gwG4qAL._SL1500_.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/5537/product)

**Offers “audio transparency” technology so you can still hear what’s going on
around you.**

Headphones give you just what you want to hear. [Samsung Galaxy
Buds](https://ideaing.com/product/samsung-galaxy-buds) give you control on how
much surrounding noise you want with Ambient Aware. The Quick Ambient Mode
lets you hear traffic, flight announcements, and co-workers who are calling
out to you when you’re in the zone.

So yep, these headphones will still keep you in touch with reality while
you’re enjoying the premium sound brought to you by AKG. While they sound
good, they also feel so comfortable. Pick out the adjustable ear tip and
wingtip size for ultimate comfort. And yes, they are splash-resistant, meaning
they are safe enough to wear during your workouts.

Lastly, these earbuds pair perfectly with both Android and iOS devices.

**Why You Should Get It**

If you’re using headphones on the go, the Samsung Galaxy Buds are best to use.
They have everything you need, and you’ll love them even more if you are a
Galaxy phone user.

**Pros**

  * Up to 6 hours of battery
  * Controls surrounding noise
  * Premium sound
  * Water-resistant
  * Pairs with both Android and iOS

**Cons**

  * Occasional echoes

## **5.[Jaybird RUN XT: Best Value](https://ideaing.com/open/5536/product)**

[![Jaybird RUN XT True Wireless
Headphones](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20401%20528'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Jaybird
RUN XT True Wireless Headphones](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/61AcdWphNAL._SL1500_.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/5536/product)

**The Jaybird RUN lets you pump out to your workout music by adjusting the
lows, mids, and the highs.**

Let’s get this out there, [the Jaybird RUN True Wireless
Headphones](https://ideaing.com/product/jaybird-run-xt) look weird, but that’s
because they have tips and fins that snug tightly to your ears giving you a
secure comfort-fit even when you’re in beast mode while working out or
running.

These sweatproof and water-resistant headphones can pump up the bass seriously
by letting you customize your music’s lows, mids, and highs through the
Jaybird app. You can even run in the rain or get muddy—Jaybird will survive.
This gives you a sporting experience that’s both exciting and fulfilling at
the same time.

On their own batteries, Jaybird can last up to 4 hours. Get an extra 12 hours
on the charging case for more convenience. Need to run ASAP? Give the case
just 5 minutes of charging and it’ll play your music during your one-hour jog.

**Why You Should Get It**

Looking for a robust headphone that will keep up with your physical
activities? The Jaybird Run is a nice pick. The rubber things work so well to
provide a secure fit, and they’re comfortable to wear. They don’t fall out
even if you’re active.

**Pros**

  * Truly wireless in-ear headphones
  * Customizable sound
  * Compatible with iOS and Android
  * Comes with a charging case that can produce an additional 12 hours of playtime

 **Cons**

  * Sensitive audio users say there’s a slight delay with video

## **6.[Bose SoundSport: Most
Comfortable](https://ideaing.com/open/3108/product)**

[![Bose SoundSport Free Wireless
Headphones](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20400%20400'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Bose
SoundSport Free Wireless
Headphones](https://d3f8t323tq9ys5.cloudfront.net/uploads/2017/08/Bose-
SoundSport-Free-Wireless-
Headphones.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/3108/product)

**Get the Bose Soundsport Wireless Headphones for total freedom of movement.**

The [Bose Soundsport Wireless Headphones](https://ideaing.com/product/bose-
soundsport-free-wireless-headphones) come with 3 different pairs of sports
headphones tips—in small, medium, and large—so you can get a fit that’s
perfect for you. They are designed to conform to the contours of your ear,
allowing for a tight seal and enhanced audio.

The sweatproof and weather-resistant Bose Soundsport Headphones last up to 5
hours of playing time, but if you bring the charging case with you, you can
get an additional 10 hours of playing time. With an IPX4 rating, you can wear
the pair even if it’s raining. They’re also protected from your sweat.

Plus, if ever you lost one of your headphones, you can find it using the Bose
app’s “Find My Buds” feature.

**Why You Should Get It**

For audiophiles with an active lifestyle. This pair of headphones has an
excellent fit and function. Sound quality is something that users have been
raving about.

**Pros**

  * Technology that makes music clear and powerful
  * Find my Buds feature for lost earbuds
  * Charging case that provides an additional 10 hours of play time
  * IPX4 rating

 **Cons**

  * Video syncing issues on iPhone 7+ or iPhone x

## **7\. Sony Premium: Best Noise Isolation True Wireless Earbuds**

[![Sony WF-1000XM3 Industry Leading Noise Canceling Truly Wireless
Earbuds](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20403%20105'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Sony
WF-1000XM3 Industry Leading Noise Canceling Truly Wireless
Earbuds](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/61of2DmgdUL._AC_SL1500_.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/6402/product)

**Sony’s digital noise canceling lets you listen without distractions.**

If you get easily distracted and wished you don’t, getting a pair of [**Sony
WF-1000XM3**](https://ideaing.com/product/sony-wf-1000xm3-noise-canceling-
earbuds)will help. Its digital noise cancellation technology facilitates
concentration so you can focus on your work. Its true wireless design also
gives you uninterrupted Bluetooth streaming. The amazing thing about this is
it can instantly give you a rope to escape reality.

The premium noise cancellation led by Sony is possible with HD Noise Canceling
Processor QN1e and improved sound quality using 24bit Audio signal processing.
Both left and right wireless earbuds are functional to easily switch from
listening mode to ambient mode where you can hear conversations and your
environmental activities.

Keep going longer since the battery lasts to 24 hours, just always bring with
you its carrying case. A quick charge of at least 10 mins can get you the
extra 90-minute playback. You can also enjoy a hands-free calling and voice
assistant with a simple touch.

**Why you should get it**

Sometimes you just have to mute everything else but the music in your ears.
Sony WF-1000XM3 has superior noise canceling delivering quality sounds in
totally wireless earbuds.

**Pros**

  * High Definition Noise Canceling 
  * Superb sound quality
  * 24-hour playback time and quick charge feature
  * Touch controls using earbuds

 **Cons**

  * Not sweat/water resistant

## **8.[Jabra Elite Sport: Most
Active](https://ideaing.com/open/2204/product)**

[![Jabra Elite Sports wireless Bluetooth
earbuds](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20700%20368'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Jabra
Elite Sports wireless Bluetooth
earbuds](https://d3f8t323tq9ys5.cloudfront.net/uploads/2017/01/Jabra-Elite-
Sports-wireless-Bluetooth-
earbuds-700x368.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/4460/product)

**The Jabra Elite Sport Bluetooth earbuds come with a 3-year warranty to
protect against perspiration.**

Like most of the earbuds on this list, the [Jabra Elite
Sport](https://ideaing.com/product/jabra-sport-coach-special-edition) is great
for music, media, and calls. There are microphones in each bud, and they work
together to filter background noise during a conversation.

They offer up to 3 hours of use on a single charge, but a portable charging
case can hold an additional two full charges. If you’re counting, that’s a
total of 9 hours of use.

The earbuds have an IP67 dust and water resistance rating, which means they’re
waterproof – and sweat proof too. Plus, Jabra offers a 3-year warranty against
failure from sweat and moisture.

**Why You Should Get It**

If a secure fit and great sound are what you’re looking for and you don’t want
to break the bank, go with Jabra Elite.

**Pros**

  * High end Bluetooth compatible wireless earbuds
  * Heart Rate Monitor and Fitness Analyzer
  * Extended battery life
  * Compatible with most iOS and Android smart devices

 **Cons**

  * Users were having charging issues after some time

## **9\. B &O PLAY Beoplay E8: Best in High-Quality Streaming**

[![Bang & Olufsen Beoplay E8 2.0 True Wireless
Earphones](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20402%20382'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Bang
& Olufsen Beoplay E8 2.0 True Wireless Earphones](https://images-na.ssl-
images-
amazon.com/images/I/61yy43wtBYL._AC_SL1050_.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/6403/product)

**Posh design, excellent signature sound quality**

Moment of silence for a small but powerful wireless earbud, [**Bang & Olufsen
Beoplay E8 2.0 **](https://ideaing.com/product/bang-and-olufsen-
beoplay-E8-2-true-wireless-earphones)deliver a signature quality of sound
created by the brand’s sound engineers. The Bluetooth headphones apply Near
field magnetic induction (NFMI), a cutting edge style of audio streaming. You
will only hear clear, rich sound from these modern, wireless earbuds. It is Qi
certified and if you are feeling techier, it is compatible with a wireless
charger too.

You can conveniently listen and control the interface with your touch even if
you are active. It includes taking calls hands-free and transparency mode
which reconnects you with reality, the ambient noises around you. The Beoplay
E8 2.0 can play 4 hours each full charge, a total of 16 hours with its
wireless, charging case on hand because it can be a portable charger carrying
three full charges.

**Why you should get it**

Bang & Olufsen Beoplay E8 2.0 is the perfect wireless earphone for people on
the go with its high sound quality perfected by sound engineers and easy
interface. The sleek design is empowered by vast functions.

 **Pros**

  * High-quality sound ensured by sound engineers
  * Easy touch controls in a wireless earbud
  * Qi-certified
  * Up to 16 hours of playtime

 **Cons**

  * Others find its volume setting low

## **10\. Anker Soundcore Liberty 2 Pro: Best Fully-Featured True Wireless
Earbuds**

[![Anker Soundcore Liberty 2 Pro True Wireless
Earbuds](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20205%20376'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Anker
Soundcore Liberty 2 Pro True Wireless Earbuds](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/I/61phc1elkiL._AC_SL1500_.jpg)](https://ideaing.com/open/6404/product)

**Trouble sleeping? The noise-masking technology of Bose will help you with
it.**

The pros have spoken, [**Anker Soundcore Liberty 2
Pro**](https://ideaing.com/product/anker-soundcore-liberty-2-pro-true-
wireless-earbuds) is recommended by 10 Grammy Award-winning producers who can
attest to the premium quality sound it produces. The Knowles driver is a
Balanced Armature effective for interference cancellation and balance between
high and low notes. You will hear your playlist on a whole, new level with
Liberty 2 Pro’s rich and detailed musicality after personalizing your hearing
settings in the Soundcore app.

Listen morning until night and still have hours left of playtime because the
earbuds can last for 32 hours. In addition to that, the wireless earphones are
Qi-certified so you may choose USB-C or a wireless charger. Liberty 2 Pro
delivers clear voice calls using 4 microphones as you speak and cVc 8.0 noise
reduction as you receive.

**Why you should get it**

10 Grammy Award-winning producers recommend it, Anker Soundcore Liberty 2 Pro

## — Bluetooth Earbuds Buyers Guide & FAQ —

### **What to look for in buying a Bluetooth Earbuds**

Listening to good music is all fun until the wire of your earphones gets
tangled. If you’re planning to go wireless, then you’ll need these Bluetooth
earbuds. There are many wireless earbuds on the market, but is there really a
difference? Lucky for you, we have prepared guidelines on choosing the perfect
Bluetooth earbuds for you! Check this out:

**Ease of Installation –** Bluetooth earbuds are easy to install; it just
takes a couple of seconds. You can listen to good music with just three easy
steps: get your smartphone or MP3 player, sync your Bluetooth earbuds, enjoy
good music wirelessly. Just sync it and then you’re good to go!

 **Price Check –** Prices really vary on the product’s brand, quality and
features. You just really have to choose one that’s worth the price and would
satisfy your needs. Some would range anywhere from $50 to $400. If they are
expensive but have all the features you want, how could you say no, right?

 **Aesthetics –** Not all Bluetooth earbuds are completely wireless. They
still use wires but they do not need to be directly connected to your device.
This shouldn’t make any difference, since you can stand still and listen to
good music anytime, anywhere. Just choose one that would fit you and your
style.

**Battery Life –** Every product has different specifications. Some products
have a battery life that could last a couple of hours, while some would last a
day without charging.

**High Technology –** Some Bluetooth earbuds have many high tech features.
Some have a built-in fitness and activity tracker. Some also have features
like: sweatproof, water-resistant, touch-based, customizable sound, digital
voice cancellation technology, and more.

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20399%20266'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![](https://images-
na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/71FHnYmLRwL._SL1200_.jpg)

###

###  **How to setup and use true Wireless Earbuds**

Bluetooth earbuds are incredibly simple to use. It takes only a couple seconds
to sync them to a phone or MP3 player via Bluetooth. Once they’re synced, you
shouldn’t have to do it again.

Some earbuds – like the Apple Airpods – are designed to connect automatically
to your device as soon as you put them in your ears. No fiddling necessary!

###

###

###  **Bluetooth Earbuds FAQs**

You can listen to any song with any Bluetooth earbuds, but each set of earbuds
has different specs, quality, design, and price. You should just invest in the
right one for you. To further help you choose, here are questions mostly asked
when buying a Bluetooth earbuds:

### **Q: Is it compatible with Android only?**

A: No, there are products made for Android phones and some made strictly for
iOS phones. However, there are also some that can work for both, which is what
I would recommend getting.

###  **Q: Do I have to bring my device close to my Bluetooth earbuds every
time?**

A: For some brands, you have to place your device near your Bluetooth earbuds.
But others can store audio files which allows you to listen to your music
anytime without having to keep your device nearby.

###  **Q: How long will it take to charge?**

A: Like other devices, this product would require between three to four hours
of charging or more, but it really depends on the brand. Simply put, the
battery life differs from one product to another.

###  **Q: Do I need WiFi or mobile data to use this?**

A: No, Bluetooth connection is enough to let this product work, especially if
you have songs already on your device or you’re just receiving a phone call.

###  **Q: Do I have to pay for my Bluetooth connection?**

A: No, it would cost you nothing. Almost all devices today have built-in
Bluetooth connection. All you have to do is sync your earbuds with your
device.

###  **Q: Do I have to buy Bluetooth earbuds with the same brand as my
device?**

A: No, not necessarily. Not all brands of devices release Bluetooth earbuds,
so you really have to purchase one from different brands. Also, most Bluetooth
earbuds are made to be compatible with any device.

There are dozens of Bluetooth earbuds, and as time goes on, there will only
continue to be more. Choosing the best is tough, especially when they offer a
variety of “smart” features like fitness and health tracking, personal
training, local music storage, and more. How do you choose the ultimate
earbuds for everyone? Because each person wants something different out of a
product like this.

Just a couple years ago, I never would have guessed that earbuds would include
the technology to coach you during a run or workout, but here we are.
